Package me.vectorx.spring.security.jwt.authentication.store

Class VxJwtAuthenticationStore

java.lang.Object
me.vectorx.spring.security.jwt.authentication.store.VxJwtAuthenticationStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
me.vectorx.spring.security.authentication.store.VxAuthenticationStore<VxJwtAuthentication>
Direct Known Subclasses:
VxHttpHeaderJwtAuthenticationStore
public abstract class VxJwtAuthenticationStore extends Object implements me.vectorx.spring.security.authentication.store.VxAuthenticationStore<VxJwtAuthentication>
Jwt 인증 저장소 추상클래스 토큰 생성 및 유효성 체크 로직이 존재하며 실제 저장 함수만 추상화 되어 있다.
